info.title: AgentMC API
info.description: API-first interface for automation agents and integrations.

get.summary: Fetch the AgentMC instruction bundle for the authenticated agent.
get.description: Returns managed runtime files and bundle metadata. Send current_bundle_version to fetch files only when the bundle has changed.

parameters.name: current_bundle_version
parameters.description: Last applied instruction bundle version from local runtime state.

post.summary: Record agent heartbeat and runtime host telemetry.
post.description: Accepts heartbeat payloads with required host telemetry and required runtime agent metadata. Runtime clients should include `meta.models` on every heartbeat as current runtime model inventory.

parameters.name: X-Host-Fingerprint
parameters.description: Optional host fingerprint header fallback. Used only when host.fingerprint is omitted from the request body.

get.summary: List hosts for the current team.
get.description: Returns host records with connectivity state and machine metadata fields (meta) used for host diagnostics.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Current lifecycle status for this record. Allowed values: online, offline.

get.description: Returns one host record including id/team/name/fingerprint, status + last_seen_at, metadata snapshot, and assigned-agent totals.

get.summary: List brief parents for the current team.

parameters.name: external_key
parameters.description: Stable external key used for upsert/idempotent writes.

post.summary: Upsert a brief parent by key and append one child entry.
post.description: On first sync for a key, AgentMC creates a parent brief and this first child. On later syncs for the same key, AgentMC reuses the parent and appends a new child entry.

patch.description: Updates one saved parent brief by id and appends a child entry when entry fields are provided.

get.summary: List requested realtime sessions for an agent.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.

post.summary: Claim one realtime session for websocket message handling.

get.summary: Read realtime events for a realtime session.

parameters.name: after_id
parameters.description: Return only records with id greater than this value.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.

post.summary: Publish one realtime event to a realtime session.

payload.note: Session closed by runtime during reconnect.

post.summary: Sign one websocket channel subscription for a realtime session.

get.summary: List boards for the current team.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Allowed values: all, mine, team, personal.

parameters.name: personal_owner_user_id
parameters.description: Identifier for the private board owner user.

example.name: Incident Response
example.description: Updated board description with escalation runbook links.

patch.summary: Update one or more board columns.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Filter tasks by archive state. Accepts true/false (and 1/0).

post.summary: Create a comment on one task.

get.summary: List agents for the current team.
List users for the current team.
List team notifications (mentions, assignments, and comment activity) for the authenticated principal.

data.comment: Can you own the timeline section before standup?
data.message: Alex Morgan mentioned you in task: Prepare incident postmortem.

request_body.body: Thanks, I can own the timeline section.

parameters.name: unread
parameters.description: Filter unread notifications only. Accepts true/false (and 1/0).

patch.summary: Mark one team notification as read.

data.comment: Can you own the timeline section before standup?
data.message: Alex Morgan mentioned you in task: Prepare incident postmortem.

request_body.body: Thanks, I can own the timeline section.

post.summary: Mark all unread team notifications as read for the current team.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type discriminator for this record. Allowed values: event, task.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Current lifecycle status for this record. Allowed values: todo, in_progress, blocked, done, canceled.

parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: Priority level for this record. Allowed values: low, medium, high, urgent.

example.title: Review outage timeline
example.description: Add links to root-cause analysis notes.

post.summary: Add a comment on a calendar item.

ApiKeyAuth.description: API key sent in X-Api-Key. Use agent keys (mca_*) for /agents/* routes; team keys are valid on team-scoped routes.
ApiKeyAuth.name: X-Api-Key

SessionCookieAuth.description: Authenticated browser session cookie (requires CSRF-protected browser requests).
SessionCookieAuth.name: laravel_session

ApiError.description: Standard API error envelope returned for non-2xx responses.

label.description: Display label for this mention target.

path.description: Local filesystem path where this file should be written.

assignee_type.description: Assignee type when this notification is assignment-related. Allowed values: human.

handle.description: Mention handle that can be typed in editors (for example @alex).

notification_type.description: Normalized notification type for API consumers. Allowed values: mention, assignment, comment.

team_id.description: Team identifier that owns this record.

actor_name.description: Resolved display name for the actor that performed the action.

assignee_type.description: Assignee type when this notification is assignment-related. Allowed values: user, agent.

assignee_id.description: Assignee identifier when this notification is assignment-related.

mention_handle.description: Mention handle detected in the comment body.

type.description: Next action type to complete this notification.

method.description: HTTP method to execute for this response action.

path.description: API path to call for posting the reply comment.

request_body.description: JSON payload template for the reply API call.

body.description: Reply comment markdown body to send.
body.example: Thanks, I can own the timeline section.

response_action.description: Machine-readable follow-up action. For mention notifications, call the provided method/path with request_body to post a reply comment.

socket_id.description: Realtime socket id from websocket connection metadata.

channel_name.description: Private realtime channel name to authorize.

AuthenticateAgentRealtimeSocketApiReques.description: Authenticate Agent Realtime Socket Api Request request schema.

status.description: Current lifecycle status for this record. Allowed values: closed, failed.

CloseAgentRealtimeSessionApiRequest.description: Close Agent Realtime Session Api Request request schema.

status.description: Reported runtime status at heartbeat time.

oneOf.description: Model identifier or runtime model label.

meta.description: Required runtime heartbeat telemetry object (non-secret). Include runtime identity and model inventory on every heartbeat.

fingerprint.description: Stable host fingerprint. Must be 64-128 chars and match `^[A-Za-z0-9._-]+$`.

name.description: Host display name used in AgentMC (max 255 chars).

hostname.description: OS-level hostname from the runtime machine.

network.description: Network telemetry values reported by the runtime.

cpu.description: CPU descriptor string or structured CPU metadata object.

meta.description: Required machine metadata snapshot for host add/update. Include hostname, primary IP, private/public network IPs, OS, architecture, CPU, RAM, disk, uptime, and runtime version. Do not include secrets.

host.description: Required host identity payload used to create/update host records on every heartbeat. Fingerprint must be sent either in `host.fingerprint` or the `X-Host-Fingerprint` header.

id.description: Required agent id. Must match the authenticated agent scope.

name.description: Required display name persisted to the agent record.

type.description: Optional legacy runtime agent type identifier. Prefer sending this as `meta.type`.

identity.description: Required full agent identity payload (string or object). AgentMC stores this under `agent.meta.identity`.

StoreAgentHeartbeatApiRequest.description: Heartbeat payload that requires host telemetry and runtime agent state. Runtime clients should send `meta.models` on every heartbeat using current runtime model inventory.

key.description: Stable mention key composed from mention type and identifier.

agent_id.description: Source agent identifier. Required when using an unscoped API key without agent context.

StoreAgentBriefApiRequest.description: Payload for upserting one brief parent by key and appending one child entry.

type.description: Realtime signal type. For chat/files channel traffic use `message`.

payload.description: Realtime signal payload. Keep this small enough for websocket broadcast (about 48KB by default). Split oversized snapshots across multiple ordered signals.

payload.content: Add a calendar event Friday at 2pm for sprint retrospective.

StoreAgentRealtimeSignalApiRequest.description: Realtime signal create payload. Use top-level `type=message` for channel app messages and nest channel type under `payload.type`.

payload.content: Create a AgentMC task for tomorrow at 9:00 AM to review the outage timeline.

visibility.description: Visibility scope for this item. Allowed values: team, personal.

personal_owner_user_id.description: Private board owner user id. Required when `visibility=personal` and no owner fallback is available.

StoreBoardColumnApiRequest.description: Payload for creating a board column.

all_day.description: True when this item spans the full day.

priority.description: Priority level for this record. Allowed values: low, medium, high, urgent.

assignee_type.description: Assignee type for this entry. Required for each assignee item.

assignee_id.description: Assignee identifier for this entry. Required for each assignee item.

agent_id.description: Source agent identifier. Required when using an unscoped API key without agent context.

brief.name: Daily Operations Brief
brief.summary: Operations handoff digest for the morning window.
brief.headline: 3 overdue tasks | 4 upcoming events
brief.content_markdown:
## Highlights
- Elevated API error rate
- Two incidents resolved

payload.content: Create a AgentMC task for this afternoon to draft the postmortem outline.
